name: Hagane: The Final Conflict
overview: Only one man alone stands to save the world from the KOMA-clan and their plan to destroy the world. His name was "HAGANE". The lone survivor of the FUMA-clan, which was massacred by the KOMA-clan. Brought back from the fringe of death and given a cyborg body, "HAGANE" swears vengeance against the KOMA-clan.
